titles.title: A resolution supporting the observation of National Trafficking and Modern Slavery Prevention Month during the period beginning on January 1, 2019, and ending on February 1, 2019, to raise awareness of, and opposition to, human trafficking and modern slavery.

A resolution supporting the observation of National Trafficking and Modern Slavery Prevention Month during the period beginning on January 1, 2019, and ending on February 1, 2019, to raise awareness of, and opposition to, human trafficking and modern slavery.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for observing National Trafficking and Modern Slavery Prevention Month during the period of January 1-February 1, 2019.
